class artist.models.Album(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Album model representing an album.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – The title of the album.

  • artist (str) – The artist of the album.

  • release_date (datetime.date) – The release date of the album.

  • description (str) – The description of the album.

Tour model representing a tour.

  • description (str) – The description of the tour.
